verbs.description: [ARG1: pizza on the grill pizza] [V: is] [ARG2: such a favorite at our house that i make it at least once a week when the heat and humidity are up there though the last thing that i want to do is turn on the oven so i just] [C-ARG1: move my recipe to the grill — the barbecue flavor mingling with] [ARG2: the cheese tastes delicious —lisa boettcher columbus wisconsin]

pizza on the grill pizza is such a favorite at our house that [ARG0: i] [V: make] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-TMP: at least once a week] [ARGM-TMP: when the heat and humidity are up there] [ARGM-ADV: though the last thing that i want to do is turn on the oven so i just move my recipe to the grill — the barbecue flavor mingling with the cheese tastes delicious —lisa boettcher columbus wisconsin]

pizza on the grill pizza is such a favorite at our house that i make it [ARGM-TMP: at least once a week] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] [ARG1: the heat and humidity] [V: are] [ARG2: up there] [ARGM-ADV: though the last thing that i want to do is turn on the oven so i just move my recipe to the grill — the barbecue flavor mingling with the cheese tastes] delicious —lisa boettcher columbus wisconsin

pizza on the grill pizza is such a favorite at our house that i make it at least once a week when the heat and humidity are up there though the last thing that [ARG0: i] [V: want] [ARG1: to do] is turn on the oven so i just move my recipe to the grill — the barbecue flavor mingling with the cheese tastes delicious —lisa boettcher columbus wisconsin

pizza on the grill pizza is such a favorite at our house that i make it at least once a week when the heat and humidity are up there though [ARG1: the last thing] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: i] want to [V: do] is turn on the oven so i just move my recipe to the grill — the barbecue flavor mingling with the cheese tastes delicious —lisa boettcher columbus wisconsin
